code: import React from"react";import calendar_icon from'../Assets/calendar.png';import location_icon from'../Assets/location.png';import'../Styles/WorkExperienceItem.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var WorkExperienceItem=function WorkExperienceItem(props){var fromMonth=props.exp.From.split(" ")[0];var fromYear=props.exp.From.split(" ")[1];var toMonth=props.exp.To.split(" ").length>1?props.exp.To.split(" ")[0]+" - ":props.exp.To;var toYear=props.exp.To.split(" ").length>1?props.exp.To.split(" ")[1]:"";return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work-experience-item-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work-heading",children:props.exp.Role}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work-organization",children:props.exp.Organization}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"horizontal-wrapper timeline-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"small-icon",src:calendar_icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"timeline-month",children:[fromMonth," - "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"timeline-year",children:[fromYear," - "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"timeline-month",children:[toMonth," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"timeline-year",children:toYear})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"horizontal-wrapper location-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"small-icon",src:location_icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:props.exp.Location})]}),props.exp.Responsilbilities.map(function(responsibility,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"horizontal-wrapper responsibilities-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bullet bullet-brown",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bullet-inner bullet-brown"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:responsibility})]},index);})]});};export default WorkExperienceItem;
